faq-authentic-windows-question.message: Psiphon yangu ya Windows ni halisi?
faq-authentic-windows-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon ya Windows haisambazwi kamwe kama kifurushi kinachoweza kusakinishwa. Kila Psiphon ya mteja wa Windows ni faili moja inayoweza kutekelezwa (".exe") ambayo imetiwa sahihi kidijitali na Psiphon Inc. Windows hukagua saini hii kiotomatiki unapoendesha kiteja. Unaweza pia kukagua saini wewe mwenyewe kabla ya kuendesha kiteja kwa kutumia kidirisha cha Sifa kwa faili na kukagua kichupo cha Sahihi za Dijitali. Alama ya dole gumba ya SHA1 ya ufunguo wa umma wa cheti cha Psiphon Inc. inaonyeshwa kwenye kichupo cha Maelezo ya kidirisha cha Cheti.
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2026.message: Kwa cheti halali kuanzia tarehe 2023-05-01 hadi 2026-07-28, alama ya kidole gumba cha SHA1 ni:
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2026.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-authentic-android-question.message: Psiphon yangu ya Android ni halisi?
faq-authentic-android-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-authentic-android-answer-alert.message: TAHADHARI: Athari iliyoripotiwa hivi majuzi inaweza kusababisha ukaguzi wa sahihi wa programu ya Android kuripoti APK hasidi kuwa halali. Tunapendekeza kwamba watumiaji wawashe kipengele cha programu ya Google Verify kama ilivyoandikwa hapa .

faq-authentic-android-answer-para-1.message: Kila Psiphon ya mteja wa Android huwasilishwa kama faili ya APK ya Android (".apk") ambayo imetiwa sahihi kidijitali na Psiphon Inc. Ufunguo wa umma wa cheti cha Psiphon Inc. ni kama ifuatavyo:

faq-authentic-android-answer-para-2.message: APK inaweza kuthibitishwa kwa (1) kutoa cheti kutoka kwenye kumbukumbu na kuangalia kama alama zake za vidole zinalingana na thamani iliyo hapo juu na (2) kuthibitisha kuwa APK imetiwa sahihi na cheti. Kwa mfano, kwa kutumia Unix na zana za mstari wa amri za Java:

faq-unsupported-platforms-question.message: Psiphon inapatikana kwa macOS, Linux, Simu ya Windows, n.k.?
faq-unsupported-platforms-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.message: Majukwaa tunayohimili ni yale yanayopatikana kwenye ukurasa wa Kupakua. Tunafanya kazi kila mara ili kupanua usaidizi wetu wa majukwaa, kwa hivyo tunatumai kuwa tutahimili Mfumo wako wa Uendeshaji unaotaka katika siku za usoni!
faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Is Psiphon available for OS X, Linux, iOS, Windows Phone, etc.?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: "Kupakia kando" inamaanisha kusakinisha programu kwenye kifaa chako bila kupitia Duka la Google Play. Hii inafaa kwa watu ambao hawana idhini ya kufikia Play Store, au wakati programu haipatikani katika eneo lao.
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: Ili kusakinisha upakuaji wa moja kwa moja wa Psiphon kwa Android, lazima uwashe upakiaji wa kando kwenye kifaa chako. Ili kufanya hivyo, nenda kwenye mipangilio yako ya Android, kisha kwenye sehemu ya "Usalama", kisha wezesha "Vyanzo visivyojulikana".
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-enable-sideloading-image-alt.message: Picha ya skrini ya mipangilio ya usalama ya Android inayoruhusu usakinishaji wa programu zisizo za Google Play Store

faq-windows-xp-eol-question.message: Psiphon ya Windows inafanya kazi kwenye Windows XP au Vista?
faq-windows-xp-eol-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.message: Kuanzia Desemba 2019, Psiphon haitumii Windows XP au Vista. Toleo la zamani linapatikana kwa upakuaji ambalo litafanya kazi kwenye majukwaa hayo kwa siku zijazo, lakini watumiaji wanahimizwa sana kupata toleo jipya la Windows.
faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows XP or Vista?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-7-eol-question.message: Je, Psiphon ya Windows inafanya kazi kwenye Windows 7, 8, au 8.1?
faq-windows-7-eol-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-7-eol-answer-para-1.message: Kuanzia Aprili 2024, Psiphon haitumii Windows 7, 8, au 8.1. Muundo wa toleo unapatikana kwa kupakuliwa ambao utafanya kazi kwenye mifumo hiyo kwa siku zijazo, lakini watumiaji wanahimizwa sana kupata toleo jipya la Windows.
faq-windows-7-eol-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows 7, 8, or 8.1?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.message: Tafadhali tazama Sera ya Faraghaili kujifunza kuhusu taarifa tunazokusanya.
faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.description: This is the FAQ answer to the question 'What info does Psiphon collect?' The user needs to go to a separate page to see the full answer.

faq-ip-change-question.message: Kwa nini anwani yangu ya IP ya Psiphon hubadilika mara kwa mara?
faq-ip-change-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ip-change-answer-para-1.message: Kiteja chako cha Psiphon kitagundua seva mpya za Psiphon kiotomatiki. Wakati seva ya mwisho iliyotumiwa haipatikani kwa sasa, nyingine inaweza kutumika badala yake.
faq-ip-change-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-connection-failed-question.message: Kwa nini naona ujumbe "muunganisho umeshindwa" ukijirudia tena na tena?

faq-connection-failed-answer-para-1.message: Ukiona ujumbe unaorudiwa wa "muunganisho umeshindwa", inamaanisha kuwa hakuna seva zinazopatikana ambazo kiteja chako kinajua kuzihusu. Jaribu kupakua kiteja kipya cha Psiphon.
faq-connection-failed-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-question.message: Baada ya kutumia Psiphon kwa Windows kompyuta yangu haiwezi tena kuunganishwa kwenye Mtandao.
faq-reset-system-proxy-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.message: Wakati Psiphon ya Windows inapounganisha hubadilisha mipangilio ya seva mbadala ya kompyuta yako, na inapokata muunganisho huirejesha katika hali asili. Ikiwa Psiphon ya Windows haitoki vizuri, inaweza isirejeshe vizuri mipangilio ya awali ya seva mbadala, na hii itasababisha ushindwe kuunganisha kwenye Mtandao.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.message: Njia rahisi zaidi ya kurekebisha hii kwa watu wengi ni kuunganishwa na Psiphon tena, na kisha kukata muunganisho kwa njia safi.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.message: Ili kurekebisha mwenyewe mipangilio yako ya seva mbadala, fungua Internet Explorer, kisha uende kwenye menyu ya Zana (au ikoni ya gia), Chaguo za Mtandao → kichupo cha Viunganisho → Kitufe cha Mipangilio ya LAN. Kisha ondoa alama ya kuteua kando ya "Tumia seva ya proksi kwa LAN yako".
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-upgrade-bug-question.message: Baada ya kusasisha Psiphon ya programu ya Android, haitaunganishwa.
faq-android-upgrade-bug-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.message: Ikiwa Psiphon imeunganishwa wakati sasisho linasakinishwa, huenda isiweze kuunganishwa baadaye na itaonyesha hitilafu “start_tunnel_failed haijatayarishwa au kubatilishwa". Hii ni kutokana na hitilafu ya programu ya Android. Hali hii inaweza kurekebishwa kwa kuwasha upya kifaa chako.
faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After upgrading the Psiphon for Android app, it won't connect.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-periodic-disconnect-question.message: Kwa nini muunganisho wangu wa Psiphon wakati mwingine hukata?
faq-periodic-disconnect-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.message: Hii mara nyingi husababishwa na muunganisho wa Mtandao usioaminika au usio thabiti kwenye kifaa au kompyuta yako. Kwenye simu, hii inaweza kumaanisha kupoteza mapokezi. Kwenye kompyuta, hii inaweza kumaanisha Wi-Fi isiyolingana au Mtoa Huduma wa Mtandao asiyetegemewa.
faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my Psiphon connection sometimes disconnect?'

faq-ie6-docbody-question.message: Psiphon ya Windows inatoa hitilafu "doc.body is null or not an object" na haifanyi kazi.
faq-ie6-docbody-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.message: Hitilafu hii itatokea kwenye Windows XP ikiwa Internet Explorer 6 imesakinishwa. Psiphon ya Windows inahitaji Internet Explorer 7 au toleo jipya zaidi kusakinishwa. Njia bora ya kusakinisha matoleo ya juu zaidi ya Internet Explorer ni kupitia Sasisho la Windows.
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.message: Ikiwa huwezi kutumia Usasishaji wa Windows na unataka kusakinisha Internet Explorer 7 au Internet Explorer 8 moja kwa moja, unaweza kuzipata kupitia viungo hivi:
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.'

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie8.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie7.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-check-version-question.message: Ninawezaje kuangalia toleo langu la sasa la Psiphon?
faq-check-version-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-check-version-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon inapoanza, inaonyesha Toleo la Kiteja kwenye safu ya kwanza ya faili ya kumbukumbu.
faq-check-version-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-question.message: Ninawezaje kupata toleo lililosasishwa la Psiphon?
faq-get-updated-version-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.message: Android: Ikiwa umesakinisha Psiphon kwa Android kupitia Google Play Store, itasasishwa kiotomatiki na Play Store wakati sasisho linapatikana. Ikiwa umepakia kando Psiphon kwa Android, mteja wa Psiphon atapakua masasisho jinsi yanavyopatikana, na arifa itaonekana kukuuliza usakinishe sasisho.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Android users. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.message: Windows: Psiphon ya kiteja cha Windows itapakua na kusakinisha masasisho kadri yanavyopatikana
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Windows users. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.message: Kusasisha wewe mwenyewe: Ikiwa utaratibu wa kujisasisha wa Psiphon haufanyi kazi (kwa mfano, ikiwa imezuiwa), unaweza kupokea habari kuhusu kupata nakala mpya ya Psiphon kutoka kwa Ukurasa wa upakuaji.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' if the user believes that the automatic updating feature isn't working (or is blocked). 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-orig-file-purpose-question.description: Do no translate or transliterate the filename.

faq-orig-file-purpose-answer-para-1.message: Mchakato wa kusasisha kiotomatiki katika Psiphon ya Windows hubadilisha jina la toleo lake la zamani kuwa "psiphon3.exe.orig". Faili za zamani zilizo na kiambishi tamati ".orig" zinaweza kufutwa kwa usalama.
faq-orig-file-purpose-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-uninstall-windows-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon ya Windows haisakinishwi, na haitaonekana kwenye orodha ya Windows ya "Ongeza au Ondoa Programu". Faili inayoweza kutekelezwa inaweza kuendeshwa kutoka kwenye saraka yako ya "Vipakuliwa", au inaweza kunakiliwa kwenye saraka tofauti na kuendeshwa kutoka hapo. Ikiwa unataka kuondoa programu, unaweza kufuta faili inayoweza kutekelezwa.
faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I uninstall Psiphon for Windows?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-clear-windows-data-question.message: Ninawezaje kufuta Psiphon kwa data ya ndani ya Windows?
faq-clear-windows-data-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon ya Windows huhifadhi data fulani ndani chini ya wasifu wa mtumiaji. Iko kwenye njia kama C:\Users\YourName\AppData\Local\Psiphon3; au, kwa ujumla zaidi, %USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local. Unaweza kufuta data ya ndani kwa kwenda kwenye njia hiyo katika Windows Explorer na kuifuta, au kuingiza kiamrisho hiki kwa amri ya haraka: rmdir /s "%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local". Pia kuna habari iliyohifadhiwa kwenye sajili ya mfumo kwa HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Psiphon3. Unaweza kutumia zana ya Windows regedit kufuta funguo hizo za Usajili.
faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I clear Psiphon for Windows' local data?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-question.message: Je, Psiphon ya Windows huelekeza trafiki yangu yote ya Mtandao kupitia Seva mbadala?
faq-proxy-all-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-answer-para-1.message: Katika hali ya VPN pekee. Baada ya muunganisho uliofanikiwa kuanzishwa katika hali ya VPN, trafiki ya kompyuta yako yote itapitia mtandao wa Psiphon. Wakati hali ya VPN haijawashwa ni programu tumizi zinazotumia proksi ya HTTP na SOKETI pekee ndizo zitakazofanywa kuwa seva mbadala.
faq-proxy-all-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-question.message: Je, Kivinjari cha Psiphon cha iOS huelekeza trafiki yote ya Mtandao ya kifaa changu?
faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-answer-para-1.message: Kivinjari cha Psiphon cha iOS ni programu ya kivinjari pekee na kwa hivyo kitachuja tu data ambayo imepakiwa kwenye programu yenyewe, na haitachuja programu zako zingine (kama vile programu zako za Facebook au Twitter) kupitia mtandao wa Psiphon. Kwa hivyo, kwa mfano, ikiwa ungependa kutumia mtandao wa Psiphon kufikia akaunti yako ya Facebook, ungetumia Psiphon Browser kwenda kwenye tovuti ya Facebook. Iwapo utafungua programu yako ya Facebook, utatumia muunganisho wako wa moja kwa moja wa intaneti, na hautapitsishwa kupitia mtandao wa Psiphon.
faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-browser-compatibility-question.message: Psiphon kwa Madirisha inayoendana na Tovuti Explorer, Firefox, na kivinjari wavu ya Chome?
faq-browser-compatibility-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-browser-compatibility-answer-para-1.message: Ndiyo. Angalia mipangilio ya kivinjari chako na uhakikishe kuwa imesanidiwa kutumia mipangilio ya seva mbadala ya mfumo.

faq-port-restrictions-question.message: Kuna vizuizi vyovyote vya bandari wakati wa kutumia Psiphon?
faq-port-restrictions-question.description: FAQ question. Note that 'port' is referring to network ports. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.message: Miunganisho ya nje kupitia mtandao wa Psiphon inaweza tu kufanywa kwa seti iliyozuiliwa ya milango ya seva ikijumuisha: 53,80,443,465,587,993,995,8001,8080 . Tazama majadiliano haya kwa taarifa zaidi. Viteja vya barua haviwezi kuanzisha miunganisho ya nje kwenye lango 25. Tazama mazungumzo hayakwa taarifa zaidi.
faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Are there any port restrictions when using Psiphon?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mail-apps-ports-question.message: Kwa nini siwezi kutumia programu ninayopenda wakati Psiphon inafanya kazi? Kwa nini siwezi kutuma barua pepe kwa kutumia kiteja changu cha barua pepe?
faq-mail-apps-ports-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.message: Hii labda ni kwa sababu ya vizuizi vya lango vya Psiphon.
faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I use my favorite app while Psiphon is running? Why can't I send email using my mail client?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mobile-hotspot-question.message: Kwa nini hotspot ya rununu ya Android na muunganisho wa USB haufanyi kazi kupitia Psiphon?
faq-mobile-hotspot-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.message: Hii ni kutokana na kizuizi katika hotspot ya Android na utekelezaji wa muunganisho. Unaweza kupata kwamba kifaa kilichofungwa hakiwezi kuunganishwa kwenye mtandao au trafiki haitapitia VPN.
faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why do Android mobile hotspot and USB tethering not work through Psiphon?'

faq-av-firewall-question.message: Kwanini programu yangu ya kukinga virusi (AV) au ngome inatambulisha Psiphon kama tishio?
faq-av-firewall-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.message: Jambo la kwanza kuangalia ni kwamba una nakala halisi ya Psiphon. Tafadhalifuata maelekezo haya kuhakiki kwamba nakala yako ya psiphon imetibitishwa. kama haijathibitishwa, tafadhali tutumie barua pepe kwa taarifa kuhusu umepata vipi nakala na, kama inawezekana, na Psiphon inayoweza kutekelezwa iliyoambatanishwa.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.message: Ikiwa nakala yako ya Psiphon ni halisi, basi huu ni mfano wa ripoti chanya ya uwongo. Ingawa programu nyingi za kukinga virusi / ngome zimeongeza sahihi ya dijiti ya Psiphon kwa sheria zao za orodha iliyoidhinishwa, baadhi bado zinaweza kutambua kimakosa faili inayoweza kutekelezwa ya Psiphon kama virusi au tishio. Katika hali hii, tafadhali tutumie barua pepe , ukibainisha AV/programu ya firewall unayotumia, na tutawasiliana na muuzaji AV/ ngome kutatua tatizo.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-question.message: Kwa nini siwezi kushughulikia programu zangu za Windows Metro (UI ya Kisasa) kupitia Psiphon?
faq-windows-metro-question.description: FAQ question. 'Metro' or 'Modern' is the fancy user interface that Microsoft introduced with Windows 8. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.message: Windows 8 ilianzisha njia mbadala ya kiolesura cha programu ya eneo-kazi inayoitwa "Metro", ambayo baadaye ilibadilishwa jina na kuwa "UI ya kisasa". Baadhi ya programu, lakini ni chache sana, zinaweza kutumika tu katika "Modi ya Metro" na baadhi (kama Internet Explorer) zinaweza kufanya kazi katika "Modi ya Metro" au "Modi ya Desktop". Hali hii mpya ya kiolesura inaendelea kuwepo katika Windows 8.1 na, kwa kiwango kidogo, katika Windows 10.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?'

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.message: Programu katika modi ya Metro haziwezi kutumia seva mbadala ya ndani bila mtumiaji kurekebisha mipangilio ya usalama ya mfumo. Hii inamaanisha kuwa programu za modi ya Metro haziwezi kutumia Psiphon, na hazitaweza kufikia mtandao wakati Psiphon imeunganishwa. Unaweza kutumia Wezesha Utumiaji wa Loopback ili kuruhusu programu za modi ya Metro kufanya kazi na Psiphon.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' 'EnableLoopback' should not be translated. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.message: Ifuatayo ni mifano ya ujumbe wa hitilafu unaoweza kuuona wakati programu za modi ya Metro zinajaribu na kushindwa kufanya kazi kupitia Psiphon.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' This sentence is followed by two screenshots of error messages. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-protocol-question.message: Ni itifaki gani ya VPN inayotumiwa na Psiphon kwa Windows? Kwa nini siwezi kuunganisha?
faq-vpn-protocol-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-protocol-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon hutumia itifaki ya L2TP/IPsec VPN.
faq-vpn-protocol-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-vpn-connect-question.message: Kwa nini siwezi kuunganisha na Psiphon ya Windows katika modi ya L2TP/IPsec?
faq-windows-vpn-connect-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-vpn-connect-answer-para-1.message: Ngome ya mtandao wako inaweza isiruhusu matumizi ya VPN. Ruta yako ya nyumbani inaweza kuwa haijasanidiwa kupita itifaki hii ya VPN; angalia mipangilio yako ya ngome ili kuona kuwa upitishaji wa IPsec au L2TP umewashwa. Huduma za IPsec za mfumo wako zinaweza kuzimwa; angalia mipangilio ya huduma yako na uwashe huduma hizi kuanza kiotomatiki.

faq-vpn-slow-question.message: Ninaweza kuunganisha na Psiphon kwa Windows katika modi ya VPN, lakini kwa nini inajikokota sana? Wakati mwingine kurasa za wavuti hazipakii kabisa.
faq-vpn-slow-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-slow-answer-para-1.message: Baadhi ya maunzi ya mtandao au miunganisho ya Mtandao inaweza kusababisha matatizo ya utendakazi kwa L2TP/IPsec ambayo ni itifaki inayotumiwa na Psiphon katika hali ya VPN. Jaribu kuzima modi ya VPN.
faq-vpn-slow-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-dns-question.message: Ninapounganisha kwa Psiphon kwa Windows katika modi ya VPN, hakuna kurasa zangu za wavuti zinazopakia. Ninapata ujumbe wa hitilafu unaoonyesha kuwa utafutaji wa kikoa umeshindwa.
faq-vpn-dns-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-dns-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon huzuia trafiki ya DNS kwa seva za DNS zilizoorodheshwa kuwa sawa, zilizohakikiwa. Kiteja cha Psiphon husanidi kiotomatiki mipangilio ya seva yako ya VPN DNS. Ikiwa unapata hitilafu zinazohusiana na DNS, hakikisha kwamba hujaambukizwa na programu hasidi ya "DNS Changer", ambayo inajaribu kubadilisha mipangilio ya seva yako ya DNS. Taarifa zaidi zinaweza kupatikana hapa.

faq-configure-applications-question.message: Ninawezaje kusanidi programu kutumia njia ya Psiphon?

faq-configure-applications-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon itasanidi kiotomatiki mfumo wako ili kutumia seva mbadala ya HTTP/HTTPS ya ndani na seva mbadala ya karibu ya SOKETI. Nambari za mlango wa seva mbadala hizi huchaguliwa kwa nasibu, isipokuwa kama imebainishwa katika mipangilio ya Psiphon. Programu za Windows zinazotumia Mipangilio ya Mfumo wa Proksi zitawekwa kiotomatiki. Unaweza kusanidi programu zingine mwenyewe kutumia seva mbadala za ndani. Psiphon ya Windows na Psiphon ya Android huendesha proksi hizi za ndani.

faq-ssh-plus-question.message: Je, njia chaguo-msingi ya Psiphon hutumia itifaki gani?

faq-ssh-plus-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon hutumia SSH pamoja na kuongezwa kwa safu isiyoeleweka juu ya kupeana mkono kwa SSH ili kulinda dhidi ya uwekaji alama wa vidole wa itifaki. Maelezo ya itifaki yanaweza kupatikana hapa.

faq-autoproxy-question.message: Ninawezaje kuiambia Psiphon ya Windows isisanidi mipangilio ya proksi ya mfumo wangu?

faq-autoproxy-question-toc.message: Ninawezaje kuiambia Psiphon ya Windows isisanidi mipangilio ya proksi ya mfumo wangu?

faq-autoproxy-answer-para-1.message: Bonyeza Run, na uandike regeditkufungua Registry Editor. Tafuta na ufunguei. Tafuta na ufunguo HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Psiphon3, na upande wa kulia utaona SkipProxySettings. Seti thamani hii kwa 1 na Psiphon haitasanidi kiotomatiki mipangilio ya seva mbadala ya mfumo.

faq-whatsapp-windows-question.message: Ninawezaje kufanya WhatsApp kwa Windows kufanya kazi kupitia Psiphon?

faq-whatsapp-windows-question-toc.message: Ninawezaje kufanya WhatsApp kwa Windows kufanya kazi kupitia Psiphon?

faq-whatsapp-windows-answer-para-1.message: Utafiti na ripoti za watumiaji zinaonyesha kuwa programu ya WhatsApp ya Windows haipatiwi seva mbadala ipasavyo kupitia Psiphon. Huu ni upungufu katika programu ya WhatsApp. Kama usaidizi ukiongezwa na wakati, kuna uwezekano kwamba ingizo hili la maswali yanayoulizwa mara kwa mara kwenye WhatsApp litasasishwa kwa maelekezo. Kutumia WhatsApp kupitia kiolesura chake cha wavuti kwenye web.whatsapp.com hufanya kazi ipasavyo kupitia Psiphon.

faq-screen-filter-question.message: Psiphon ya Android inapounganishwa kwa mara ya kwanza, kwa nini siwezi kuchagua "Ninaamini programu hii"?

faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.message: Angalia ikiwa unaendesha programu ya kichujio cha skrini au programu inayodhibiti mwangaza wa skrini yako. Ikiwa ndivyo, jaribu kuizima. Nyingi za programu hizi (kama vile Lux Auto Brightness, Twilight, Night Mode) huingilia uwezo wa mtumiaji wa kuingiliana na kidokezo hiki.
faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to 'What protocol does the default Psiphon tunnel use?'.

faq-isp-traffic-question-toc.message: Je, ISP yangu inaweza kuona ninachofanya kwenye Mtandao wakati ninatumia Psiphon?

faq-isp-traffic-question.message: Je, ISP yangu inaweza kuona ninachofanya kwenye Mtandao wakati ninatumia Psiphon?

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-1.message: Data yote inayopitia Psiphon imesimbwa kwa njia fiche. Hii ina maana kwamba ISP yako haiwezi kuona maudhui ya trafiki yako ya Mtandao: kurasa za wavuti unazovinjari, ujumbe wako wa gumzo, upakiaji wako, n.k.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-2.message: Hata hivyo, tafadhali kumbuka kuwa Psiphon imeundwa kuwa zana ya kuzuia udhibiti, na haijaundwa mahususi kwa madhumuni ya kuzuia udukuzi. Psiphon haizuii historia yako ya kuvinjari na vidakuzi kuhifadhiwa kwenye kompyuta yako. Na katika hali na usanidi fulani trafiki yako yote ya Mtandao inaweza isipitishwe kupitia Psiphon -- kwa mfano ikiwa mipangilio ya seva mbadala ya kivinjari chako imesanidiwa vibaya, au ukiacha kivinjari chako wazi baada ya kuondoka kwa Psiphon.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-3.message: Pia kuna mbinu za hali ya juu ambazo zinaweza kuangalia trafiki iliyosimbwa na kubainisha baadhi ya mambo kuihusu, kama vile tovuti inayovinjariwa. Mfano wa msingi wa hii ni"alama za vidole za trafiki".

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-4.message: Ikiwa unahitaji kutojulikana kwenye Mtandao basi unapaswa kutumia Tor badala ya Psiphon.

faq-vulnerability-report-question.message: Je, ninawezaje kuripoti athari za kiusalama?

faq-vulnerability-report-answer.message: Tafadhali tazama faili yasecurity.txt kwa taarifa za mawasiliano.
faq-vulnerability-report-answer.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I report a security vulnerability?'.

faq-root-wdm-question.message: Ni nini kilifanyika kwa modi ya kifaa kizima kwa vifaa vya Android vilivyo na udhibiti?
faq-root-wdm-question.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-question-toc.message: Ni nini kilifanyika kwa modi ya kifaa kizima kwa vifaa vya Android vilivyo na udhibiti?
faq-root-wdm-question-toc.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.message: Kabla ya Desemba 2015 Psiphon ya Android ilikuwa na kipengele ambacho kiliruhusu walio na vifaa vya zamani vya Android (kabla ya 4.0/ICS) kuelekeza kifaa ikiwa kimedhibitiwa. Sasisho kuu kwa Psiphon wakati huo ililazimu kuondolewa kwa kipengele hicho.
faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of a FAQ answer. Previously, users with old Android devices (before Android version 4.0, also known as Ice Cream Sandwich) could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-refund-question.message: Je, nitarejeshewaje pesa za usajili, ununuzi wa PsiCash, au ununuzi mwingine?
faq-refund-question.description: This is an FAQ question. This is for refunds made with money to purchase subscriptions, PsiCash, etc. 'Puchase of PsiCash' means buying PsiCash credit with real money. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-refund-answer-para-1.message: Android:Ikiwa imepita chini ya saa 48 tangu ufanye ununuzi, unaweza urejeshewe pesa kupitia Play Store. Baada ya masaa 48, tutumie barua pepe kwa refund+android@psiphon.ca. Tafadhali jumuisha jina lako, anwani ya barua pepe ya akaunti yako ya Duka la Google Play, tarehe ya ununuzi, kile kilichonunuliwa, kiasi cha ununuzi na sababu ya wewe kuomba kurejeshewa pesa.
faq-refund-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-2.message: iOS na macOS: Tafadhali omba kurejeshewa pesa kupitia App Store.
faq-refund-answer-para-2.description: This is the second paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-3.message: Windows:Tutumie barua kwarefund+windows@psiphon.ca.Tafadhali jumuisha jina lako, anwani ya barua pepe au nambari ya simu iliyotumiwa wakati wa ununuzi, tarehe ya ununuzi, nini kilinunuliwa, kiasi cha ununuzi, na sababu ya wewe kuomba kurejeshewa pesa.
faq-refund-answer-para-3.description: This is the third paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-4.message: Kumbuka mchakato wa kurejesha pesa unaweza kuchukua hadi wiki moja kuchakatwa.
faq-refund-answer-para-4.description: This is the fourth paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-psicash-create-account-question.message: Kwa nini nifungue akaunti ya PsiCash?
faq-psicash-create-account-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses the benefits of creating a PsiCash account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-create-account-answer-para-1.message:
Ukiwa na akaunti, salio lako la PsiCash inakuwa salama na

inaweza kutumiwa kwenye vifaa vyako vyote. Ikiwa hauna akaunti ya PsiCash, salio lako ni maalum kwa kila kifaa, na kupoteza kifaa kunamaanisha kupoteza salio lako kwenye kifaa hicho. Unapokuwa na akaunti, unachohitaji kufanya ni kuingia ili kurejesha salio lako.

Pia tutaongeza manufaa zaidi ya kuwa na akaunti ya PsiCash katika siku zijazo, kama vile kuhamisha PsiCash kati ya watumiaji na kutoa ununuzi unaotumika kwenye vifaa vyako vyote..
faq-psicash-create-account-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses the benefits of creating a PsiCash account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-pseudonym-question.message: Kwa nini nitumie jina bandia au lakabu kwa jina la mtumiaji la akaunti yangu ya PsiCash?
faq-psicash-pseudonym-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses why a user might want to employ a pseudonym for their PsiCash account username. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-pseudonym-answer-para-1.message:
Jina bandia ni jina la kujitambulisha ambalo halilingani na jina lako halisi. Kutumia jina bandia kama jina la mtumiaji kwenye akaunti yako ya PsiCash husaidia kulinda utambulisho wako wa kweli dhidi ya kuunganishwa na matumizi yako ya Psiphon au PsiCash. Ikiwa kujitambulisha kama mtumiaji wa Psiphon ni hatari au haiwezi kuvumiliwa, ni vyema kuchagua jina la mtumiaji ambalo halina uhusiano na wewe, na badala yake, kutumia jina bandia ambalo hujakitumia kwenye tovuti au huduma nyingine yoyote.

Wakati wa kujiandikisha kwa akaunti mpya ya PsiCash, mtu anaweza kuthibitisha uwepo wa jina la mtumiaji kwa kujaribu kuunda akaunti kwa jina hilo. Ikiwa jaribio linafaulu, jina la mtumiaji haliwezi kupatikana. Ikiwa jaribio linashindwa, jina la mtumiaji tayari limepangwa. Ingawa kugundua jina lako la mtumiaji hakutaleta hatari kwa akaunti yako ya PsiCash, hali yako kama mtumiaji wa Psiphon inaweza kufichuliwa kwa njia hii.

Ikiwa unataka kuepuka kufungamana na utambulisho wako wa kweli, ni muhimu kutambua kuwa kutumia jina bandia ambalo tayari limetumika kwenye tovuti au huduma nyingine ni sawa na kutumia jina lako halisi. Ikiwa jina hilo bandia limeunganishwa na utambulisho wako sehemu nyingine, basi kutokujulikana hakutapatikana kwa kulitumia.

Kwa kuongeza, kumbuka kuwa barua pepe yako haitagundulika kwa njia hii. Hata ukiwa na jina bandia, unaweza kutumia barua pepe kwenye akaunti yako ya PsiCash bila wasiwasi kuwa itagundulika.
faq-psicash-pseudonym-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses why a user might want to employ a pseudonym for their PsiCash account username. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-more-account-merges-question.message: Je, iwapo nitahitaji kuunganisha salio la PsiCash kutoka kwa vifaa vingine kwenye akaunti yangu?
faq-psicash-more-account-merges-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses what a user should do if they need to merge more PsiCash into an account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-more-account-merges-answer-p.message: Ili kuzuia matumizi mabaya, tunaruhusu kuhamisha salio lililokuwepo la PsiCash na Speed Boost kutoka kwenye vifaa vichache tu hadi kwenye akaunti yako ya PsiCash unapoingia. Ikiwa una vifaa zaidi ambavyo ungependa kuweka salio navyo, tafadhali tutumie barua pepe kwa psicash.support@psiphon.ca. Tafadhali jumuisha jina lako la mtumiaji la PsiCash na sababu za kuhitaji kuunganishwa zaidi.
faq-psicash-more-account-merges-answer-p.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses what a user should do if they need to merge more PsiCash into an account. Note that the actual number for 'a few devices' is currently 3. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-param-question.message: Ni nini kigezoPsicash= katika baadhi ya URL za kurasa za kutua?
faq-psicash-param-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything). 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-param-answer-para-1.message: Katika baadhi ya URL za kurasa za kutua na katika buy.psi.cash URLs, utaona kigezo kama #!psicash=abcd1234... au ?psicash=abcd1234.... Kigezo hiki kina taarifa muhimu zinazokuwezesha kupata zawadi ya PsiCash kwa kutembelea kurasa fulani za kutua au kwa kununua PsiCash.
faq-psicash-param-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything) 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-param-answer-para-2.message: "Ishara" utakayoona katika base-64 iliyotafsiriwa ya kigezo hicho ni tokeni yako ya "mchumaji" wa PsiCash, na inaweza tu kutumika kuongeza salio kwenye akaunti yako ya PsiCash -- sio kwa kutumia PsiCash yako, kuangalia salio lako, au shughuli nyingine. Tokeni hii pia haiwezi kufichua utambulisho wako au taarifa nyingine yoyote kuhusu akaunti yako.
faq-psicash-param-answer-para-2.description: This is an FAQ answer. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything) 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-title.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-question-1-what.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-1-what.message: Una rafiki aliyeunganishwa kwenye mtandao wa Psiphon kwa kifaa cha Android na wewe huwezi kuunganishwa? Psiphon Bump ni njia salama ya kubadilishana moja kwa moja vigezo vya uunganisho vinavyofanya kazi kutoka kwa mtumiaji mwingine aliyeunganishwa.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-1-what.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-question-2-work.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-2-work-para-1.message: Psiphon Bump inatumia kipengele cha Near-Field Communication (NFC) kilichopo kwenye kifaa chako. Kwa kutumia mpangilio ulio thibitishwa na kufanya kazi kwenye kifaa cha rafiki ambaye hajajiunga, Psiphon inaweza kutumia taarifa hiyo kuboresha uunganisho wa baadaye kwenye mtandao.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-2-work-para-1.description: 'Psiphon', 'Bump' and 'NFC' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-2-work-para-2.message: Psiphon hubadilishana vigezo vya uunganisho vilivyotiwa saini kidijitali na kusimbwa kwa kuhakikisha siri na uadilifu wa ubadilishanaji huo. Maelezo ya data hayawezi kusomwa au kubadilishwa na mtu mwingine yeyote.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-2-work-para-2.description: 'Psiphon' and must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-question-3-device.message: Je, Psiphon Bump inasaidiwa kwenye kifaa changu?
faq-psiphon-bump-question-3-device.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-3-device.message: Psiphon Bump inasaidiwa kwa sasa kwenye vifaa vya Android pekee na inafanya kazi kwenye matoleo ya Android 5.0 na juu (SDK 21+) pamoja na msaada wa vifaa vya NFC. Vifaa vyote viwili vinahitaji kuwa sambamba kwa kubadilishana kwa mafanikio, na viwe na toleo la Psiphon 385 au la juu zaidi.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-3-device.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-question-4-how.message: Je, ni vipi naweza kutumia Psiphon Bump?
faq-psiphon-bump-question-4-how.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-1.message: Watumiaji wote wanahitaji kuwa na NFC iliyowezeshwa kwenye vifaa vyao. Kwanza, nenda kwenye Mipangilio ya Android yako na chagua “Mapendeleo ya Muunganisho” > NFC. Washa NFC kwa kubadili kipande cha kubadili kuwa “on.” Shikilia vifaa viwili vya Android vilivyo na NFC kwa mgongo kwa mgongo ndani ya umbali wa 1cm ili kuanzisha uhamishaji wa maudhui au data.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-1.description: 'Psiphon'and 'NFC' must not be translated or transliterated. Please translate 'Connection preferences' as it appears on an Android device, in the respective translation.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-2.message: Kama programu yako ya Psiphon iko katika hali ya “Inaunganishwa,” utaweza kupokea Psiphon Bump. Utapata kitufe cha “NFC” mara moja. Hakikisha unabonyeza hiki kitufe. Ikiwa uunganisho utaanzishwa mara moja kwa mafanikio, hutakiona kipengele hiki.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-2.description: 'Psiphon'and 'NFC' must not be translated or transliterated. Please translate 'Connecting' as it appears in the app, in the respective translation.

faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-3.message: Kitufe cha kuelea cha NFC, kinachofungua kisanduku cha “Pata Bump,” kitaendelea kuwa kwenye skrini muda wote ambapo programu iko katika hali ya “kuunganishwa” na kitapotea mara tu kipitishio itakapounganishwa. Aidha, ikiwa mazungumzo ya “Pata Bump” yako wazi lakini kifaa kitaunganishwa kwa mafanikio kwa kujitegemea kwa wakati huo, mazungumzo yataondoka moja kwa moja.
faq-psiphon-bump-answer-4-how-para-3.description: 'Psiphon' and 'Bump' must not be translated or transliterated. Please translate 'Get Bump' as it appears in the app, in the respective translation.

alert-heading.description: Heading of the alert that shows on the main page when there's a security or other concern that needs to be brought to the attention of users

alert-body.message: Timu ya Psiphon imegundua mfano maalum wa programu hasidi iliyofichwa kama Psiphon ya Windows inayoweza kutekelezwa. Programu hasidi inasambazwa kama faili ya zip inayoitwa "pisphone3.zip" kwenye www.copy.com na inaweza kupatikana kutoka vyanzo vingine. Faili ya zip ina binary mbaya inayoitwa "pisphone3.exe" yenye sifa zilizofafanuliwa katika Virus Total. Kumbuka makosa ya tahajia ya jina. Utekelezaji huu wa Windows haujatiwa sahihi kidijitali na Psiphon Inc. Usiwahi kupakua Psiphon mpya bila kuangalia sahihi yake ya dijitali, kama ilivyoelezwa. hapa.
alert-body.description: Heading of the alert that shows on the main page when there's a security or other concern that needs to be brought to the attention of users

download-now-button.description: The text on the Download Now button

what-is-psiphon-body-para-1.message: Psiphon ni zana ya kukwepa kutoka Psiphon Inc. ambayo hutumia teknolojia ya VPN, SSH na HTTP ili kukupa ufikiaji usiodhibitiwa wa maudhui ya Mtandao. Kiteja chako cha Psiphon kitajifunza kiotomatiki kuhusu sehemu mpya za ufikiaji ili kuongeza uwezekano wako wa kukwepa udhibiti.

main-gets-you-where-you-want-head-2.message: Je, umedhibitiwa na nchi, shirika, au chuo chako?

main-gets-you-where-you-want-para-1.message: Baada ya kushughulika na tawala kandamizi duniani kote, tunafaa kwa namna ya kipekee kukusaidia kufikia maudhui unayotaka, wakati wowote na popote unapoyataka.

main-gets-you-there-safely-head-2.message: Je, ungependa kuvinjari kwa usalama unapotumia WiFi ya umma?

main-gets-you-there-safely-para-1.message: Mtandao wa bure ni mzuri, lakini vidakuzi na akaunti zilizoibiwa sivyo. Psiphon hukupa njia salama ya Mtandao, haijalishi unatumia mtandao gani kuunganisha.

main-pick-three-para-1.message: Tangu 2008, Psiphon imesaidia mamilioni ya watu katika nchi zilizo na vikwazo vya uhuru kote ulimwenguni kufikia maarifa na mawazo yaliyodhibitiwa kwa usalama. Sasa Psiphon inaweza kukufanyia vivyo hivyo.

sponsor-description.message: Kuwa mdhamini kwa kutangaza kwenye ukurasa wa kutua, au uchangie kibinafsi kwa mradi wa Psiphon
sponsor-description.description: Page description for the Sponsorship page

sponsor-para-1.message: Kila anayepakia Psiphon ataona ukurasa wa kutua wakati wowote anapounganisha na programu. Fursa za ufadhili zinapatikana kwa wiki kwa ukurasa huu.

sponsor-para-2.message: Utaona bango la chaguo lako, ambalo litaunganishwa na ukurasa kwenye tovuti yako. Hii ni fursa ya kipekee ya kufikia hadhira kubwa ya watu wenye ufahamu wa kiufundi wanaotumia Psiphon kuongeza safu ya usalama kwenye kuvinjari kwao kwa Mtandao.

sponsor-para-3.message: Kwa taarifa zaidi, tuma barua pepe kwa sponsor@psiphon.ca

license-title.message: Mkataba wa Leseni ya Mtumiaji wa Psiphon

license-para-1.message: Programu hii na mali yote miliki inayohusishwa ni mali ya Psiphon Inc., shirika lililosajiliwa Ontario na lenye ofisi yake kuu huko Toronto, Ontario Kanada.

license-para-2.message: Mfumo wa Psiphon unajumuisha "programu" zote (msimbo wa chanzo cha programu na programu zinazotokana na msimbo huo) na "huduma" (mfumo wa programu ya kiteja na seva ambayo hufanya kazi nzima). Programu ya Psiphon na msimbo wa chanzo ni bure na huria na imepewa leseni chini ya Toleo la 3 la Leseni ya Umma ya GNU (isipokuwa baadhi ya vighairi - tazama kila hazina ya chanzo kwa leseni mahususi). Matumizi ya huduma ya Psiphon yameidhinishwa chini ya masharti yaliyoelezwa kwenye ukurasa huu.
license-para-2.description: Paragraph text on the License web page.

license-para-3.message: Huduma ya Psiphon imekusudiwa madhubuti kwa watu binafsi, na ni kwa matumizi ya kibinafsi tu. Iwapo ungependa kutumia Psiphon kwa madhumuni mengine yoyote au kuwa na mahitaji ya ziada, tunatoa huduma ya kulipia, ya kibiashara. Kwa maelezo zaidi, tuma barua pepe kwa sponsor@psiphon.ca.

license-terms-of-use-para.message: Kwa kutumia huduma ya Psiphon, unakubali kutoitumia kwa njia yoyote inayokiuka sheria za Kanada, au haki za wahusika wengine.

license-distribution-para.message: Wateja wa programu iliyoundwa na Psiphon Inc. pekee ndio wanaoruhusiwa kutumia huduma ya Psiphon. Ni ukiukaji wa leseni hii kusambaza au kutumia mhusika mwingine au zana nyingine kwa ajili ya matumizi na huduma ya Psiphon.

license-personal-or-specified-use-para.message: Matumizi ya huduma ya Psiphon yametolewa chini ya leseni isiyo ya kipekee, ya kibinafsi. Kwa kutumia Psiphon, unakubali kutumia huduma kwa matumizi ya kibinafsi, yasiyo ya kibiashara pekee. Huruhusiwi (na huwezi kuruhusu mtu mwingine) kukodisha, kutoa leseni ndogo, kuuza, kuuza tena au vinginevyo kusambaza matumizi ya huduma ya Psiphon kwa madhumuni ya kibiashara.

license-statement-of-limitations-of-liab.message: Huduma ya Psiphon inatolewa "kama ilivyo" na bila udhamini au dhima iliyoonyeshwa au iliyodokezwa ya aina yoyote. Psiphon inakanusha dhima zote zinazohusiana na matumizi ya huduma hii, ikijumuisha majeraha ya kibinafsi, au uharibifu wowote wa bahati mbaya, maalum, usio wa moja kwa moja au wa matokeo wa kibinafsi au wa kibiashara, ikijumuisha upotezaji wa data na kukatizwa kwa biashara.

license-termination-terms-of-service-vio.message: Kukomesha; Ukiukaji wa Masharti ya Huduma

Psiphon inahifadhi haki kwa uamuzi wake pekee wa kusitisha leseni hii wakati wowote kwa sababu yoyote au bila sababu, na bila adhabu. Kwa kutumia Psiphon, unakubali kutotumia huduma kwa njia yoyote inayokiuka masharti ya huduma na makubaliano ya leseni.

license-psicash-header.description: Subsection header on the License page. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

license-psicash-item-1.message: Ikiwa hakuna shughuli ya PsiCash kwenye kifaa chako kwa mwaka mmoja, basi Psiphon inahifadhi haki ya kughairi PsiCash yako.
license-psicash-item-1.description: List item under the 'Use of PsiCash' subsection of the License page. The essence of this item is that if a user doesn't earn or spend PsiCash for a year, then Psiphon might delete it. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

license-psicash-item-2.message: Ukipoteza PsiCash yako, kwa mfano kwa kupoteza kifaa chako, basi unakubali kwamba Psiphon haitaweza kurekebisha kosa hili na kurejesha PsiCash yako.
license-psicash-item-2.description: List item under the 'Use of PsiCash' subsection of the License page. The essence of this item is that Psiphon won't (and can't) restore a user's PsiCash if the user loses the device that that PsiCash is associated with. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

license-psicash-item-3.message: Psiphon inahifadhi haki ya kubadilisha zawadi zinazoweza kubadilishwa kwa PsiCash wakati wowote.
license-psicash-item-3.description: List item under the 'Use of PsiCash' subsection of the License page. The essence of this item is that Psiphon may change what things -- like Speed Boost -- cost in PsiCash. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

about-who-we-are-para-1.message: Psiphon Inc. ni kampuni iliyoko Toronto, inayozalisha programu huria ya mifumo mingi inayosaidia zaidi ya watu milioni 3 kila wiki kuungana na maudhui kwenye Mtandao. Sisi ni timu inayolenga kutoa programu bora zaidi, kutambulisha bidhaa mpya mara kwa mara na kuhakikisha kuwa tunaendeleza mahitaji ya hadhira yetu inayokua kila mara ulimwenguni.

about-who-we-are-exec-team-para-1.message: Michael Hull ni Rais wa Psiphon Inc., na amekuwa na Psiphon tangu mwanzo, ilipoanza kama mradi katika Citizen Lab, Chuo Kikuu cha Toronto. Tangu wakati huo ameongoza juhudi za ukuzaji wa programu na husaidia kuendesha uvumbuzi ambao huiweka Psiphon kidedea kwenye fani yake.

about-who-we-are-software-development-pa.message: Katika Psiphon, tunahitaji watumiaji wetu kuwa na matumizi mazuri. Hii ina maana kwamba programu yetu inahitaji kuwa rahisi kutumia, mtandao wetu unahitaji kuwa wa haraka, na zote zinahitaji kuwa thabiti kama mwamba. Hili ni ngumu kwa wasanidi programu wowote kuafikia, lakini haswa wakati programu yako inapaswa kufanya kazi katika mazingira ya maadui yanayobadilika kila wakati na katika lugha na mifumo mingi.

Pia tunajua kuwa ni muhimu vile vile kufanya kazi kwa bidii kwa watumiaji wetu nyuma ya pazia. Tunalinda watumiaji wetu na data zao kwa kiwango kikubwa. Watumiaji huenda wasitambue hatua za kuhakikisha faragha na usalama wao, lakini tunajua wanaithamini.

Timu ya ukuzaji programu ya Psiphon inajitahidi kutoa masuluhisho bora zaidi, ya haraka zaidi, rahisi na yaliyo wazi zaidi. Pia tunachunguza maeneo mapya ambapo utaalamu wetu unaweza kulinda, kuwezesha na kukomboa mawazo ya watumiaji duniani kote.

about-who-we-are-ops-para-1.message: Tuna kandarasi na kampuni mbalimbali, kutoka kwa watangazaji wakubwa wa kimataifa hadi mashirika madogo ya haki za binadamu yanayofanya kazi katika nchi fulani. Timu yetu ya Uendeshaji na Ufikiaji hukusanya ripoti zinazowaonyesha ni watu wangapi wanapata Psiphon kupitia mbinu zao za usambazaji. Pia wanasoma mienendo na kuangalia matukio yajayo ambayo yanaweza kuathiri mtiririko wa bure wa habari kwenye Mtandao.

about-who-we-are-partners-para-1.message: Psiphon inafanya kazi kwa karibu na vikundi mbalimbali ili kutoa msaada na ushauri kwa watu wanaotumia Psiphon popote walipo. Tuna tafsiri za programu yetu katika lugha nyingi, na tunaongeza zaidi kwa bidhaa zetu kupitia Transifex, kwa usaidizi wa Localization Lab.
about-who-we-are-partners-para-1.description: There are more than 20 languages currently supported, so if your language has a better fit than 'dozens', please use it. You can also just use something more generic, like 'many'.

privacy-para-1.message: Psiphon imejitolea kulinda masilahi ya faragha ya wateja wake, watumiaji, na wasambazaji. Sera hii ya faragha inakusudiwa kukupa maelezo ya jumla kuhusu jinsi maelezo yako ya kibinafsi yanaweza kutumika. Psiphon ni shirika la Kanada lenye ofisi yake kuu iliyoko Ontario, na sera yetu ya faragha imeundwa ili kuonyesha sheria na mikataba ya faragha za Kanada na Ontario.

privacy-para-2.message: Kwa habari zaidi kuhusu sheria za faragha za Kanada na Ontario, tafadhali tembelea:

privacy-canadian-privacy-commission-link.message: Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Faragha wa Kanada

privacy-ontario-privacy-commissioner-lin.message: Ofisi ya Kamishna wa Habari na Faragha wa Ontario

privacy-updates-head.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy. The section description how we handle updates to the policy.

privacy-bulletin-info-para-1.message: Mara kwa mara, Psiphon itaongeza maingizo kwenye Taarifa yetu ya Faragha. Hii itatokea kwa sababu mbili:

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.message: Tunarekebisha Sera ya Faragha. Hili linaweza kutokea wakati sheria mpya zinapoongeza mahitaji tofauti, au ikiwa tutaanza au kuacha kutumia huduma ya watu wengine. Tutafafanua mabadiliko yaliyofanywa kwenye sera.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.message: Huwa tunaondoka kwa muda kutoka kwa Sera yetu ya Faragha kwa kubadilisha mienendo yetu ya kukusanya taarifa. Hii kwa kawaida hufanywa ili kutatua tatizo na huduma yetu, au kutupa muda zaidi wa kuchanganua data yetu inayohusiana na tukio la kuvutia la udhibiti. Tutaelezea mabadiliko, kwa mfano kile kilichorekodiwa, kilihifadhiwa kwa muda gani, na kwa nini.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

faq-information-collected-question.message: Psiphon inakusanya taarifa gani ya mtumiaji?
faq-information-collected-question.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy.

privacy-information-collected-data-categ.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy. Under this heading will be sections with the different categories of data covered by the privacy policy.

privacy-information-collected-client-ads.message: Mitandao ya Matangazo ya Wateja ya Psiphon
privacy-information-collected-client-ads.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what data categories are collected by the ads shown in the Psiphon client software

privacy-information-collected-client-adv.message: Wakati mwingine huwa tunatumia matangazo kusaidia huduma yetu, ambayo yanaweza kutumia teknolojia kama vile vidakuzi na viashiria vya wavuti. Utumizi wa washirika wetu wa utangazaji wa vidakuzi huwawezesha wao na washirika wao kutoa matangazo kulingana na data yako ya matumizi. Taarifa yoyote inayokusanywa kupitia mchakato huu inashughulikiwa chini ya sheria na masharti ya sera za faragha za washirika wetu wa utangazaji:

privacy-information-collected-websites-h.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what data categories are collected by the Psiphon websites

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of Google Analytics and what info they collect

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.message: Tunatumia Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google kwenye baadhi ya tovuti zetu kukusanya taarifa kuhusu matumizi. Taarifa zilizokusanywa na Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google zitatumika tu kwa uchanganuzi wa takwimu zinazohusiana na mwenendo wako wa kuvinjari kwenye tovuti hii mahususi. Taarifa tunayopata kutoka kwa Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google haitambulishi kibinafsi, wala haijaunganishwa na taarifa kutoka kwa vyanzo vingine ili kuunda maelezo ya mtu binafsi.

Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google huweka kidakuzi cha kudumu katika kivinjari chako cha wavuti ili kukutambulisha kama mtumiaji wa kipekee wakati mwingine unapotembelea tovuti, lakini kidakuzi hiki hakiwezi kutumiwa na mtu yeyote isipokuwa Google, na data iliyokusanywa haiwezi kubadilishwa au kurejeshwa na huduma kutoka kwa vikoa vingine.

Uwezo wa Google wa kutumia na kushiriki maelezo yaliyokusanywa na Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google kuhusu kutembelea kwako kwenye tovuti hii umezuiwa na Sheria na Masharti ya Uchambuzi wa tovuti ya Google na Sera ya Faragha ya Google. Unaweza kuchagua kuondoka kwa kuzima vidakuzi katika mipangilio ya mapendeleo kwenye kivinjari chako cha wavuti

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of logging access to data storage (aka S3 bucket logging). The way to read this is 'creation of logs for user accesses to data storage'. Psiphon 'stores' websites, downloads, and upgrades (the 'data') in Amazon S3 (the 'storage'). Users 'access' the data storage. And, somtimes, we 'log' those accesses. (For example, if we suspect attackers are accessing the storage, or if it seems the storage is blocked by a country.)

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.message: Tunatumia Amazon S3 kuhifadhi vipengee kama vile faili za tovuti na orodha za ugunduzi wa seva ya Psiphon. Wakati mwingine tunawezesha uwekaji kumbukumbu wa upakuaji wa faili hizi. Kuchanganua kumbukumbu hizi hutusaidia kujibu maswali kama vile "ni watumiaji wangapi wanaanza lakini hawakamilishi upakuaji wa orodha ya ugunduzi wa seva?", "data iliyopakuliwa inagawanywaje kati ya vipengee vya tovuti na ugunduzi wa seva?", na "je mvamizi anatengeneza jaribio la kunyimwa huduma dhidi ya tovuti zetu?"

S3 bucket access logszina anwani za IP, mawakala wa watumiaji na mihuri ya muda. Kumbukumbu hizi zimehifadhiwa katika S3 yenyewe, kwa hivyo Amazon inaweza kufikia kumbukumbu hizi. (Hata hivyo, Amazon tayari hutumikia faili, kwa hivyo wanaweza kupata taarifa hii.) Watengenezaji wa Psiphon watapakua kumbukumbu, kukusanya na kuchambua data, na kisha kufuta kumbukumbu. Data ghafi itawekwa kwa muda wa kutosha kuijumlisha na haitashirikiwa na wahusika wengine.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon inaendesha seva nyingi kwa sababu nyingi. Katika hizo seva tunakusanya data ili kuchunguza afya ya mfumo wa Psiphon. Inatusaidia kusoma vitu kama vipi Psiphon itafanya kazi, vipi mkakati wa uenezaji umetekelezwa, na vipi watumiaji wanapokea kiteja cha Psiphon.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-2-.message: Idadi ya maombi ya barua pepe kwa majibu yetu ya kiotomatiki
Ni mara ngapi kila itifaki inatumiwa, na misimbo ya hitilafu baada ya kukwama.
Ni mara ngapi seva mpya hugunduliwa
Idadi ya vipindi na muda wa kipindi
Kiasi cha data iliyohamishwa kupitia mfumo wa Psiphon
Mfumo wa kiteja (orodha iliyorahisishwa ya mfumo wa uendeshaji; sio utambulisho wa kina wa kivinjari)

faq-information-collected-answer-para-3b.message: Anwani za IP za mtumiaji hazikusanywi na seva za Psiphon katika muda wa kawaida wa kufanya kazi. Psiphon haihitaji akaunti za mtumiaji, kwa hiyo, kwa chaguo-msingi, hakuna mkusanyiko wa anwani za barua pepe, majina ya watumiaji, au nywila.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-4.message: Kumbukumbu za matukio ni pamoja na mihuri ya muda, nambari ya eneo (nchi na jiji), na sifa zisizotambulisha ikiwa ni pamoja na kitambulisho cha mfadhili (kinachobainishwa na muundo upi wa kiteja cha Psiphon unatumiwa), toleo la mteja na aina ya itifaki.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-5.message: Takwimu zozote zinazoshirikiwa na wahusika wengine zilizokusanywa kwa tarehe, mdhamin,  na eneo, kwa kiasi cha kutosha ambacho hakitambulishi.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-he.message: Shughuli ya Mtumiaji na Data ya VPN
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-he.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page for the section describing handling of user traffic data and activity statistics through the Psiphon VPN

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kwa nini unapaswa kujali?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes why it's important for users to consider what a VPN does with their traffic data.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Unapotumia VPN au seva mbadala unapaswa kuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kile ambacho mtoa huduma wa VPN anaweza kuona katika data yako, kukusanya kutoka kwayo, na kufanya nayo.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Unapotumia VPN, data yote kutoka kwa kifaa chako hupitia ndani yake. Ukitembelea tovuti inayotumia HTTP ambayo haijasimbwa, data yote ya tovuti hiyo inaonekana kwa VPN. Ukitembelea tovuti inayotumia HTTPS iliyosimbwa kwa njia fiche, maudhui ya tovuti yanasimbwa kwa njia fiche, lakini baadhi ya maelezo kuhusu tovuti yanaweza kuonekana kwa VPN. Programu na huduma zingine kwenye kifaa chako pia zitahamisha data ambayo imesimbwa kwa njia fiche au ambayo haijasimbwa. (Kumbuka kwamba hii ni tofauti na usimbaji fiche ambao VPN zote hutoa. Hapa tunahusika tu na data ambayo imesimbwa au haijasimbwa ndani ya njia ya VPN.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page. '<em>' is an 'emphasis' (like italics) HTML tag, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kwa huduma ambazo hazijasimbwa, inawezekana kwa mtoa huduma wa VPN kuona, kukusanya, na kurekebisha (k.m., kuingiza matangazo) yaliyomo kwenye data yako. Kwa data iliyosimbwa kwa njia fiche, bado inawezekana kwa VPN kukusanya metadata kuhusu tovuti zilizotembelewa au hatua zilizochukuliwa. Unapaswa pia kuwa na wasiwasi na mtoa huduma wako wa VPN kushiriki data yako na watu wengine.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Psiphon HAIFANYI nini na data yako?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what undesirable things Psiphon DOES NOT do with user data. '<strong>' is an HTML tag that makes text bold, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: HATUKUSANYI au kuhifadhi data yoyote ya VPN ambayo haijatajwa hapa.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: HATUREKEBISHI maudhui ya data yako ya VPN.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: HATUSHIRIKI data yoyote nyeti au mahususi ya mtumiaji na wahusika wengine.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: Psiphon hukusanya data ya watumiaji ya aina gani?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: Tutafafanua baadhi ya kategoria za data ili kutusaidia kuzizungumzia katika muktadha wa Psiphon.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Paragraph text in the 'What kinds of user data does Psiphon collect?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'User Activity Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Wakati kifaa cha mtumiaji kimeunganishwa kupitia Psiphon, tunakusanya maelezo fulani kuhusu jinsi wanavyokitumia. Tunarekodi itifaki ya Psiphon iliyotumia kuunganisha, muda ambao kifaa kiliunganishwa, ni baiti ngapi zilihamishwa wakati wa kipindi, na baadhi ya taarifa za kijiografia na ISP. Kwa baadhi ya vikoa (lakini vichache sana, na vilivyo maarufu tu) au anwani za IP za seva (kwa mfano, seva zinazojulikana za programu hasidi) ambazo hutembelewa, pia tunarekodi ni baiti ngapi zilihamishiwa. (Lakini kamwe sio URL kamili au kitu chochote nyeti zaidi. Na vikoa vya maslahi ya jumla pekee, si vikoa vyote.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Mji, nchi, na ISP ya mtumiaji zinatokana na anwani ya IP ya mtumiaji; anwani ya IP basi hutupwa mara moja. Watumiaji wanaweza pia kuombwa kuruhusu ufikiaji wa eneo lao kwa hiari (sahihi hadi kilomita 3) kwa kutumia huduma ya eneo la kifaa chao (k.m., GPS).
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Mfano wa data ya shughuli za mtumiaji unaweza kuwa: Wakati fulani mtumiaji aliunganishwa kutoka New York City, kwa kutumia Comcast, na kuhamisha MB 100 kutoka youtube.com na 300MB kwa jumla.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Tunazingatia data ya shughuli za mtumiaji kama aina nyeti zaidi ya data. Kamwe hatushiriki data hii na wahusika wengine. Tunahifadhi data ya shughuli za mtumiaji kwa angalau siku 90, kisha tunaijumlisha na kuifuta. Chelezo za data hiyo huwekwa kwa muda unaofaa.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Data "hujumlishwa" kwa kuchukua data nyingi nyeti ya shughuli za mtumiaji na kuichanganya pamoja ili kuunda data mbovu ya takwimu ambayo si mahususi tena kwa mtumiaji. Baada ya kujumlisha, data ya shughuli ya mtumiaji inafutwa.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Mfano wa data iliyojumlishwa inaweza kuwa: Katika siku mahususi, watu 250 waliunganishwa kutoka New York City kwa kutumia Comcast, na kuhamisha 200GB kutoka youtube.com na 500GB kwa jumla.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Data iliyojumlishwa si nyeti sana kuliko data ya shughuli, lakini bado tunaichukulia kama inayoweza kuwa nyeti na hatuishiriki katika fomu hii.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Shareable Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: Tunaposhiriki data iliyojumlishwa na wahusika wengine, tunahakikisha kwamba data haikuweza kuunganishwa na vyanzo vingine ili kufichua utambulisho wa watumiaji. Kwa mfano, hatushiriki data kwa nchi ambazo zina watumiaji wachache wa Psiphon kwa siku moja. Tunahakikisha kuwa data haijatambulishwa.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: Pia hatushiriki taarifa zinazohusiana na kikoa na wahusika wengine.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: Mfano wa data iliyojumlishwa inayoweza kushirikiwa inaweza kuwa: Katika siku fulani, watu 500 waliunganishwa kutoka New York City na kuhamisha jumla ya GB 800.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: Mfano wa data ambayo haiwezi kushirikiwa: Katika siku mahususi, watu 2 waliunganishwa kutoka Los Angeles. Watu hao watajumuishwa katika takwimu za Marekani nzima, lakini ni watu wachache mno kuweza kushiriki data ya jiji bila kujulikana.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page. '<em>' is an HTML tag that adds emphasis (like italics), which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Psiphon hufanya nini na Shughuli ya Mtumiaji na Data Iliyojumlishwa?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what Psiphon does with the little bit of VPN data that it collects stats from.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Shughuli na data iliyojumlishwa ya takwimu ni muhimu kwetu ili kufanya Psiphon ifanye kazi vizuri zaidi. Inaturuhusu kufanya mambo kama vile:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kufuatilia afya na mafanikio ya mtandao wa Psiphon: Tunahitaji kujua ni watu wangapi wanaunganisha, kutoka wapi, ni kiasi gani cha data wanachohamisha, na ikiwa wana matatizo yoyote.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kufuatilia vitisho kwa vifaa vya watumiaji wetu: Tunaangalia maambukizo ya programu hasidi ambayo hujaribu kuwasiliana na seva za amri na udhibiti.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kuhakikisha watumiaji wanasalia wameunganishwa huku wakizuia vidhibiti: Tunajaribu kugundua kuwa mtumiaji anatenda kama mtu halisi na kisha kuwafunulia seva mpya za Psiphon. (Hii ni teknolojia yetu ya orodha ya seva iliyofichwa.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kukadiria gharama za siku zijazo: Kiasi kikubwa cha data ya mtumiaji tunayohamisha kila mwezi ni sababu kuu ya gharama zetu. Ni muhimu kwetu kuona na kuelewa mabadiliko ya matumizi.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kubaini aina ya matukio makubwa ya udhibiti: Tovuti na huduma mara nyingi huzuiwa ghafla na bila tahadhari, hali ambayo inaweza kusababisha tofauti kubwa katika matumizi ya kikanda ya Psiphon. Kwa mfano, tulikuwa na matumizi ya hadi mara 20 ndani ya siku ambapo Brazil ilizuia WhatsApp au Uturuki ilizuia mitandao ya kijamii.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kuelewa tunayehitaji kusaidia: Baadhi ya tovuti na huduma hazitawahi kuzuiwa popote, zingine zitazuiwa kila wakati katika nchi fulani, na zingine zitazuiwa mara kwa mara katika baadhi ya nchi. Ili kuhakikisha kuwa watumiaji wetu wanaweza kuwasiliana na kujifunza kwa uhuru, tunahitaji kuelewa mifumo hii, kuona ni nani aliyeathiriwa, na kufanya kazi na washirika ili kuhakikisha kuwa huduma zao zinafanya kazi vyema na Psiphon.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Je, Psiphon hushiriki Data Iliyojumlishwa na nani?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes who Psiphon shares VPN data stats. The answer will be organizations and not specific people, in case that makes a difference in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Data iliyojumlishwa inayoweza kushirikiwa inashirikiwa na wafadhili, mashirika tunayoshirikiana nayo na watafiti wa mashirika ya kiraia. Data inaweza kutumika kuonyesha vitu kama vile:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Who does Psiphon share these statistics with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Jinsi Psiphon inavyofanya kazi vizuri katika eneo fulani.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Mienendo ya kuzuia katika nchi fulani, kwa mfano wakati wa matukio ya kisiasa.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kwamba watu wa nchi wamedhamiria kuufikia mtandao wazi.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: my.psi.cash hutumia reCAPTCHA v3 ya Google (hapa "reCAPTCHA"), ambayo hulinda tovuti dhidi ya barua taka na kutumiwa vibaya na watumiaji wasio binadamu (yaani, roboti). reCAPTCHA hukusanya taarifa za kibinafsi zinazohitajika kwa utendakazi wa teknolojia na ziko chini ya sera yake ya faragha. Matumizi ya my.psi.cash yanaonyesha kukubalika kwa Sera ya Faragha na Sheria na Masharti ya Google.
privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.description: Paragraph text in the 'my.psi.cash' section of the Privacy page. 'my.psi.cash' is the domain name of the website and must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: Matumizi yetu ya reCAPTCHA yana mipaka madhubuti katika kuhakikisha utendakazi endelevu wa my.psi.cash. teknolojia ya reCAPTCHA hufanya uchanganuzi otomatiki kwa kila ombi la tovuti bila kuhitaji mtumiaji kuchukua hatua zozote za ziada. Uchambuzi huu unatokana na mwingiliano unaofanywa na mtumiaji, na hutumiwa kupunguza mfumo wa roboti na tabia nyingine hasidi kwenye tovuti yetu. Data inayokusanywa wakati wa uchanganuzi hutumwa kwa Google, ambapo Google itatumia data hii kubaini kama wewe ni mtumiaji wa kibinadamu. Uchambuzi huu hufanyika chinichini, na watumiaji hawashauriwi kuwa unafanyika.
privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.description: Paragraph text in the 'my.psi.cash' section of the Privacy page. 'my.psi.cash' is the domain name of the website and must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: Kwa maelezo zaidi kuhusu teknolojia ya Google ya reCAPTCHA, tafadhali tembelea https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/.

Header text in the 'my.psi.cash' section of the Privacy page. Refers to the cookies stored by web browsers.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: my.psi.cash hutumia vidakuzi na teknolojia zinazofanana za kufuatilia ili kutekeleza shughuli muhimu kwa uendeshaji wa tovuti. Vidakuzi muhimu vinahitajika kuhakikisha utendaji wa msingi wa tovuti. Vidakuzi ni faili ndogo za maandishi ambazo huhifadhiwa kwenye kompyuta yako na kivinjari chako, na haziwakilishi hatari yoyote kwa kifaa chako. Unaweza kusanidi mipangilio ya kivinjari chako kubinafsisha jinsi unavyotaka kivinjari chako kishughulikie vidakuzi. Kuzima vidakuzi muhimu kutapunguza utendaji wa tovuti hii.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-6.message: Unapochagua kuwasilisha maoni kupitia Psiphon utakuwa na chaguo la kujumuisha data ya uchunguzi. Tunatumia data hii ili kutusaidia kutatua matatizo yoyote ambayo unaweza kuwa nayo na kutusaidia kufanya Psiphon kuendelea vizuri. Kutuma data hii ni hiari kabisa. Data imesimbwa kwa njia fiche kabla ya kuituma, na inaweza kufutwa na sisi pekee. Taarifa katika data inatofautiana kulingana na jukwaa, lakini inaweza kujumuisha:

faq-information-collected-answer-para-11.message: Unapotuma ombi la barua pepe kwa seva yetu ya kujibu barua pepe kiotomatiki, tunaweza kuona anwani yako ya barua pepe. Wakati barua pepe yako inachakatwa, huhifadhiwa kwenye diski ya seva ya barua pepe, na inafutwa mara tu inapomaliza kuchakatwa (kwa kawaida ndani ya sekunde chache). Anwani yako ya barua pepe inaweza kurekodiwa katika kumbukumbu za mfumo wa seva. Kumbukumbu hizi hufutwa baada ya wiki moja.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-12.message: Seva yetu ya kujibu barua pepe kiotomatiki inapangishwa kwenye wingu la Amazon EC2. Hii inamaanisha kwamba Amazon inaweza kuona barua pepe unazotuma na majibu yetu kwako.

Seva ya barua kulikotoka ombi la barua pepe. (Sehemu tatu zisizo maalum za jina la kikoa. Kwa mfano, ne1.example.com, na sio web120113.mail.ne1.example.com.)
